main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer

main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: A leading e-commerce company based in sweden. A company offers a broad range of groceries online and focused on delivering high quality food items at competitive price. They have also entered in strategic partnership with Volvo to launch “Volvo in Car Delivery” an innovative  online service to deliver groceries directly to customers car .Mat.se has a full range of food products in combination with inspiring recipes, weekly menus and the ability to hand-pick your own grocery bags. www.mat.se.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: A leading indian Aadhaar eSign and eStamping  gateway which provide a platform for digital business documentation. That provide secure, legally acceptable, tamper proof, quick and convenient Aadhaar eSign and eStamping facilities to all kinds of businesses. And its provide different type of signatures like Document Signer (PKCS12), DSC (PKCS11), Virtual Sign, Aadhaar based Online  and Offline eSign.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: A leading e-commerce company based in sweden.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: A tool to automate the delivery of video contents for online access on YouTube and DITTO tv. This tool was used to upload video content for Sony, Colors, Zee along with their metadata for online viewing. Major features of this tool were to capture data from UI and generate XML/CSV then uploading the same with the video file and thumbnail images. In phase 2 of the project we are planning to integrate ASPERA for quickly uploading to YouTube. We are also integrating ELEMENTAL server with our tool and a secondary application which will facilitate a priority queue to ensure that not all systems in the network start sending the data.

work.company: DDEX Ingestion Tool (ToTheNew Digital Pvt Ltd)
work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: A tool to complete the Digital Supply Chain. This tool implements the standardised Digital Data Exchange (DDEX) standards which are widely used by major merchants like iTunes, Google Music, YouTube and many more. Through this tool we facilitated the functionality for the music providers to ingest their content to merchants like Google and YouTube. Google will be starting Google Music using this tool in India.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
